approve.description: Approves the spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the owner.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to the specified recipient.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender by the caller.

changeController.description: Changes the controller address for the contract.

createCloneToken.description: Creates a new clone token with specified parameters.

generateTokens.description: Generates new tokens for the specified owner.

destroyTokens.description: Destroys tokens from the specified owner.

claimTokens.description: Claims tokens from the specified token address.

approveAndCall.description: Approves a spender and executes a call on the spender.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that the spender can spend on behalf of the owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens held by the specified account.

balanceOfAt.description: Returns the balance of tokens at a specific block number.

creationBlock.description: Returns the block number when the contract was created.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used to get the user representation of the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

totalSupplyAt.description: Returns the total supply of tokens at a specific block number.

transfersEnabled.description: Returns whether token transfers are enabled.

version.description: Returns the version of the contract.

parentToken.description: Returns the address of the parent token.

parentSnapShotBlock.description: Returns the snapshot block number of the parent token.

tokenFactory.description: Returns the address of the token factory.

controller.description: Returns the address of the current controller.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one account to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when an owner approves a spender.

NewCloneToken.description: Emitted when a new clone token is created.
